> 1. How to verify complete contract which is based on partial 
> contract provided by an Abstract class, using JUnit ? 

> 2. How to verify complete contract which is based on partial 
> contract provided by an Interface, using JUnit ? 

What you should do it writing a TestCase that you play against each of the
classes implementing a certain interface.

You'll have to add new parameters for your TestSuite/TestSetup/TestCase classes
(for your class to test) but it's nothing unmanageable.

For an example you can browse the tests of Xindice (XML Apache project),
especially those targetting the Filers
<http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/xml-xindice/java/tests/src/org/apache/xindice/core/filer>

-Vladimir
